author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the bacon and fry for 2-3 minutes. Add the red pepper, leek, garlic and chilli flakes and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cook gently for 3-4 minutes, then add a splash of boiling water and stir well. Stir in the cooked pasta and basil and immediately pour into a bowl and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  3 rashers streaky bacon, chopped,  1 red pepper, chopped,  ¼ leek, chopped,  2 cloves garlic, chopped,  pinch chilli flakes,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  150g/5½oz fresh pasta, cooked according to packet instructions,  handful basil, chopped
